targets.query: select "name" as "container", alameda_scaler_namespace as namespace, alameda_scaler_name as "alameda scaler", pod_name as pod, node_name as node, "policy", is_alameda from alameda_cluster_status..pod group by "alameda_scaler_namespace", "alameda_scaler_name", "pod_name", "name" order by time desc limit 1
select restart_count,  "name" as "container",  "namespace", "pod_name" as pod, "node_name" as node from alameda_cluster_status..container
select "policy", "alameda_scaler_name", "name" as pod from alameda_cluster_status..pod
select create_time *1000 , "name", node_cpu_cores, node_memory_bytes, in_cluster from alameda_cluster_status..node

panels.content:
<script>
$( document ).ready(function() {
  for (var i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
    var el = document.getElementsByClassName("variable-value-link")[i];
    if(el.childNodes && el.childNodes[0].nodeValue.indexOf('None') !== -1) {
	    el.childNodes[0].nodeValue = el.childNodes[0].nodeValue.replace('None', 'N/A')
    }
  }
  $(document).on("click",".gf-form-inline",function() {
    var option = $('.variable-option')[0];
    if(option.childNodes && option.childNodes[3].childNodes[0].nodeValue.indexOf('None') !== -1) {
       option.childNodes[3].childNodes[0].nodeValue = option.childNodes[3].childNodes[0].nodeValue.replace('None', 'N/A')
    }
  });
  
});

$(".variable-value-link").on('DOMSubtreeModified', function () {
 if(this.childNodes && this.childNodes[0].nodeValue.indexOf('None') !== -1) {
	  this.childNodes[0].nodeValue = this.childNodes[0].nodeValue.replace('None', 'N/A')
  }
});
</script>
<style>
  #panel-56 {
    display:none;
  }
</style>
panels.title: Panel Title

targets.query:
select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."controller" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$controller'  and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select sum(mean) from (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..cluster_cpu where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..namespace_cpu where "name" = '$ns' and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..application_cpu where "name" = '$scaler' and "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..controller_cpu where "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns' and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)) where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() group by time(3600s)

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."controller" where granularity = '3600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$controller' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select sum from ( select sum(resource_request_cpu), count(resource_request_cpu) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -3600s and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0

panels.title: CPU: Observation, and Prediction (in CPU milicore)

targets.query:
select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),

( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'upper_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(3600s)),

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '3600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select sum(mean) from (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..cluster_memory where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..namespace_memory where "name" = '$ns' and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..application_memory where "name" = '$scaler' and "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..controller_memory where "namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' and time >= now() -5d and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)) where time >= now() -5d and time <= now() group by time(3600s)

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '3600' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."controller" where granularity = '3600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$controller' and  namespace = '$ns' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(3600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5d and time <= now() + 1d and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(3600s))

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_memory), count(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '3600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/   and  time >= now() -3600s and time <= now()+1d  group by time(3600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(21600s)),

( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),

( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."application" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."container" where kind = 'lower_bound' and granularity = '21600' and "metric" = 'memory_usage_bytes' and time >= now() and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(21600s))

select sum(mean) from (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..cluster_memory where time >= now() -5w and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..namespace_memory where "name" = '$ns' and time >= now() -5w and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..application_memory where "name" = '$scaler' and "namespace" =~ /^[[ns]]$/ and time >= now() -5w and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)), (select mean(value) from alameda_metric..controller_memory where "namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' and time >= now() -5w and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)) where time >= now() -5w and time <= now() group by time(21600s)

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '21600' and time >= now()  and time <= now() + 1w and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '21600' and time >= now()  and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and granularity = '21600' and time >= now()  and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."controller" where granularity = '21600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_RECOMMENDATION' and time >= now()  and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$controller' and namespace = '$ns' and 'Controller' = '$resource' group by time(21600s))

select * from
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from  "alameda_planning".."cluster" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."namespace" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$ns' and 'Namespace' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."application" where "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource' group by time(21600s)),
( select sum(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and time >= now() - 5w and time <= now() + 1w and "name" = '$container' and pod_name = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource' group by time(21600s))

select sum from (select sum(resource_request_memory), count(resource_request_memory) from "alameda_planning".."container" where granularity = '21600' and "name" =~ /^[[h_container]]$/ and "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and "planning_type" = 'PT_PLANNING' and "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and  time >= now() -21600s and time < now()+1w  group by time(21600s) fill(none)) where count = $count_container + 0

select * from 
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."cluster" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '86400' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 20w and time <= now() + 4w and 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by time(86400s)),
( select sum(value) from "alameda_prediction".."namespace" where kind = 'raw' and granularity = '86400' and "metric" = 'cpu_usage_seconds_percentage' and time >= now() - 20w  and time <= now() + 4w and 'Namespace' = '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by time(86400s)),

list.label: Scope
list.name: resource
list.query: Cluster, Namespace, Application, Controller

list.definition: select "name" from (select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "namespace" as "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Application' = '$resource' or 'Controller' = '$resource')
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: select "name" from (select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "namespace" as "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Application' = '$resource' or 'Controller' = '$resource')

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="alameda_scaler_name"  where "namespace" = '$ns'  and 'Namespace' != '$resource'

list.definition: select "name",  "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where  "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'  and 'Controller' = '$resource'
list.label: Controller
list.name: controller
list.query: select "name",  "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where  "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'  and 'Controller' = '$resource'

list.definition: select "name", scaling_tool from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "top_controller_name" = '$controller' and scaling_tool =~ /VPA/ and 'Controller' = '$resource'
list.label: Pod
list.name: pod
list.query: select "name", scaling_tool from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "alameda_scaler_namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "top_controller_name" = '$controller' and scaling_tool =~ /VPA/ and 'Controller' = '$resource'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Controller' = '$resource'
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from container with key="name" where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Controller' = '$resource'

list.definition: select "name", value from (select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by "name"),(select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by "name")
list.name: h_ns
list.query: select "name", value from (select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Cluster' = '$resource' group by "name"),(select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Cluster' != '$resource' and "name" = '$ns' group by "name")

list.definition: select "name", "value" from (select "name", "value" from alameda_cluster_status..application where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by "name"), (select "name", "value" from alameda_cluster_status..application where "namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by "name")
list.name: h_scaler
list.query: select "name", "value" from (select "name", "value" from alameda_cluster_status..application where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/  and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = '$resource') group by "name"), (select "name", "value" from alameda_cluster_status..application where "namespace" ='$ns' and 'Cluster' != '$resource' and 'Namespace' != '$resource' group by "name")

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from  (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "name" = '$controller' and 'Controller' = '$resource')
list.name: h_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from  (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" =~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "name" = '$controller' and 'Controller' = '$resource')

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "name" = '$pod' and "alameda_scaler_scaling_tool" =~ /VPA/ and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.label: h_pod
list.name: h_pod
list.query: select "name", "policy" from (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"=~ /^[[h_ns]]$/ and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Cluster' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" =~ /^[[h_scaler]]$/ and 'Namespace' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and 'Application' = '$resource'), (select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where "namespace"= '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" ='$scaler' and "name" = '$pod' and "alameda_scaler_scaling_tool" =~ /VPA/ and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select "name", restart_count from (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Container' != '$resource'),  (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')
list.label: h_container
list.name: h_container
list.query: select "name", restart_count from (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and 'Container' != '$resource'),  (select "name", restart_count from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" ='$h_pod' and "name" = '$container' and 'Container' = '$resource')

list.definition: select count("name") from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = 'resource' or 'Application' = 'resource')), (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'))
list.label: Count
list.name: count_container
list.query: select count("name") from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" =~ /^[[h_pod]]$/ and ('Cluster' = '$resource' or 'Namespace' = 'resource' or 'Application' = 'resource')), (select "name", resource_request_cpu from alameda_cluster_status..container where "pod_name" = '$pod' and 'Container' = '$resource'))

list.definition: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1
list.label: Preloader
list.name: preloader
list.query: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from node with key = "name" where 'Cluster' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader')
list.name: node
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from node with key = "name" where 'Cluster' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader')

list.definition: select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Namespace' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') and "name" = '$ns'
list.name: namespace_ns
list.query: select "name", value from alameda_cluster_status..namespace where 'Namespace' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') and "name" = '$ns'

list.definition: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Application' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') and namespace = '$ns' group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: app_ns
list.query: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Application' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') and namespace = '$ns' group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select alameda_scaler_namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Container' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: container_ns
list.query: select alameda_scaler_namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where 'Container' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select "namespace", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where 'Controller' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: controller_ns
list.query: select "namespace", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where 'Controller' = '$resource' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'
list.name: deployment_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'
list.name: deploymentConfig_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'
list.name: statefulset_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'
